Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2014 03:21PM ValleyMom wrote: Hi Terri -   I just wanted to say hello and let you know I am thinking about you.  I am a single mom too, and I know it's extra scary because we are all our kids have.  I spent yesterday morning lying on the table after my ultrasound, waiting for the radiologist, and for the first time let my mind wander to actually contemplate "what if?"  I want you to know I am praying for you!!!  Big hugs!!
Posts.Title: Terrified!!! :'( Terri001 jbdayton

Posts.Content: ValleyMom wrote: Last year, I found (or thought I found) a lump under my arm - right where my arm meets my breast.  Sometimes I could find it, sometimes I couldn't.   By the end of the year, it was definitely there, all the time, so I made an appt. - my GP referred me for a mammogram & ultrasound, which I had today.  The radiologist came in and said there was nothing to worry about..... it was just a cyst.  PHEW!  Well...... a couple of hours later, I'm in 7-11 and the doctor's office # pops up on my phone.  It's the radiologist..... he tells me that after looking at the pics further, he was looking for a hair follicle, which is usually what causes a cyst..... but he doesn't see one.  So.... he's calling because he doesn't want me to be alarmed when they call me to schedule a follow up ultrasound in four months.... I couldn't ask a lot of questions as I was standing in the middle of a convenience store with my 8 year old..... but what the heck?  I am supposed to wait four months for what?  Is he going to see if it grows?  Why can't they just do a biopsy now?  Just wondering if anyone here has experienced this..... I am 45, my paternal aunt was diagnosed at 65, other than that, no family history of breast cancer at all. Thank you in advance to anyone who replies! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Cyst but no hair follicle? ValleyMom ValleyMom

Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2014 06:43PM ValleyMom wrote: That is good info. to know..... thank you!
Posts.Title: Cyst but no hair follicle? ValleyMom ValleyMom

Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2014 07:11PM ValleyMom wrote: It's not under my arm, it's right at the edge of my breast - imagine a barbie doll - where the arm joins the torso - it's right at that line, on the breast side, not really where any hair grows. I'm going to call back tomorrow and ask more questions.  I was just caught off guard, and of course, being in the middle of 7-11 isn't exactly the best place to have a medical conversation! I really appreciate your responses.  I don't want to tell anyone IRL because I don't want anyone to worry about something that is probably nothing.  So thank you very much!!!
Posts.Title: Cyst but no hair follicle? ValleyMom ValleyMom
